broker.ipc

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • broker.ipc.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Client table of all currently connected clients.
    Author:
    heineman

    • Field Detail

      • id

        public final java.lang.String id
        Unique key generated by client when first run. Will be unique for duration of existence. Can be used to determine when a client reconnects after severing a connection.

      • thread

        public final BrokerThread thread
        BrokerThread for client. Communications can be sent through its buffers.

    • Constructor Detail
